entry.content:
Hello everyone!

Okay, this is my blog’s first post. I’m not sure what should be write here, so this page may be a normal self-introduction.
I don’t want to leave my real name on the Internet.
This is not safe, and I want to say something that I dare not say in reality.
Therefore, it is best to remain anonymous.
(I can’t believe that Facebook banned my account just because I wanted to change my name.)

Before you continue reading, remember that I will not always tell the truth.

So,where should we begin?
How about…

####Why are you want to write this?
The truth is I don’t want to write anything.
:But my college notice me that my graduate has been delay, cause my credit isn’t enough.
But my university informed me that my graduation was delayed because I didn’t have enough credits.
And one of the reasons is that my English is terrible.
So I have to learn it, listen, speak, read, and write.
This is write.

(to be continued)
